title.en: Merched y Wawr Lampeter Branch Mystery Tour
title.cy: Taith Ddirgel Merched y Wawr Llanbedr Pont Steffan a'r Cylch

description.en:
Swper ar ôl Taith Ddirgel yn y Lamb, Llangeler tua chanol y 70au.
Rhes Gefn: Tilly Williams; Ray Williams; Ann Lewis; Mary Jones; Mrs Hamer; Lena Williams;  (?); Iris Jenkins; Luned Lewis Nancy Davies;  Ail Res o’r Cefn: Miss Price; Luned Abel; Elsie Williams;  Nansi Evans a Joan Evans (efeilliaid); Mrs Davies, Brynmeddyg; Cissie James; Maggie Maud Jones; Ray Morgan, Glandŵr;  Mrs Donovan; (?); Anne Rees, Y Banc; Mrs Davies, Bon Marche; Mrs Jacob Davies.
Rhes Nesaf: Elizabeth Warmington; Mrs Lewis,Dolwerdd;  Phyllis Jones; Menna Evans, Brynderw; Mrs Howells, Fishers Arms;  (?);  Mrs Jones, Rhoslwyn; Mary Williams;  Mrs Angus ??; 
Rhes Flaen: Margaret Owen; Enfys Jones; Nancy Hughes; Pat Davies; Eryl Jones; Dilwen Roderick; Lettie Jones (Vaughan); Beti Evans; Avril Williams.
